title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 371.4 - Validity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 371.4 - Validity

State Regulations

If any Part, section, subdivision, paragraph or provision
of this Chapter shall be determined to be invalid, such determination shall
apply to the particular Part, section, subdivision, paragraph or provision, and
all other provisions of this Chapter shall remain valid and in
effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
371.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
